properties.areaDesc: Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 25 at 2:39AM EST until January 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST SUNDAY
